Adhesive bonds to clean, smooth and uniform surfaces made of paper, wood, stainless steel, painted steel, aluminum, glass, and rigid plastics. For best results see full product description.

contents: After experiment the vertical magnetic suction force of each 4/5" x 4/5 magnet is 200g(7.05oz) of weight and Side magnetic suction force converted to friction force can hold 100g(3.53oz) of weight.But it belongs to Weak magnetism compared to Neodymium magnet (Rare Earths magnet). So do not put valuable object on it.
3M Strong Adhesive Backing - 3M Adhesive holds objects quickly and securely, lasts a long time and does not leave marks on the surface to which it is applied.

6 Metal plate with adhesive Backing - The Package Including 6 Magnet attracting iron patch with adhesive backing, which will help non-metal or steel object hold on the magnet. Different metals have different magnets characteristic, some steel is consisted by various metals with different percentage so it may have weaker magnetic characteristic than pure iron objects.

Multiple use scenarios and functions – The magnet can be used to create teaching materials to put on whiteboards, various fridge stickers, various vision boards, for various DIY art projects. The magnets are on the back of the paper rather than on top: a clean and uncluttered look.

IMPORTANT TIPS: Uneven metal surface will reduce the magnetic effect, because the larger area the metal contact the magnetic surface, the stronger the magnetic force, if you encounter irregular metal surface, please use the iron patch to increase the magnetic force.
